hooks.prompt:
BEFORE executing this web search/fetch, evaluate the target for credibility:

AUTO-REJECT these domains (do not fetch):
- naturalnews, infowars, beforeitsnews, globalresearch.ca
- Any domain with no identifiable author/institution
- Commercial/promotional content posing as research

FLAG (proceed with caution):
- Preprints (arXiv, bioRxiv, SSRN) - note lack of peer review
- Blog/opinion pieces

PREFER:
- Peer-reviewed journals (Nature, Science, PLOS, etc.)
- Institutional sources (.edu, .gov, WHO, NIH)
- Primary source documents

If the URL matches AUTO-REJECT criteria, SKIP this fetch and note why.
